MENU.NAME: Blues Harmonica
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Spread some cheer with this Bluesband Harmonica! What a great way to get your toes tappin and fingers snappin!

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel 3-In-1 Jumbo Checkers
MENU.DESCRIPTION: This reversible rug and game pieces, made of recycled and repurposed materials, gives folks 3 great ways to have fun: Checkers, Tic Tac Toe, and Super Tic Tac Toe! Children and adults will enjoy playing these three great games over and over!

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Biscuit and Dumpling Mix
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our Biscuit and Dumpling Mix lets you choose between baking up a sheet of classic, golden-brown biscuits, or some delicious, to-die-for dumplings. A taste of home, from our kitchen to yours.

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Buttermilk Pancake Mix
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Nothing says welcome to the day, and to the breakfast table, like the mouth-watering aroma of buttermilk pancakes on the griddle. Whether in our kitchen or yours, they're prepared and shared with love.

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Coffee - Decaf
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Brighten your day with a fresh-brewed pot of premium blend decaffeinated coffee from Cracker Barrel. Get all of the rich flavor of the coffee you love at our restaurants any time of day, without the jolt of caffeine.

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Coffee - Regular
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the same coffee at home as you do in our restaurant. Blended, roasted and ground to the exacting specifications of Cracker Barrel Old Country Store. 16-oz. package.

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Coffee Single Serve Cups
MENU.DESCRIPTION: At Cracker Barrel, we searched out the finest beans and hand-selected a blend that we hope you'll find as smooth in flavor as it is in aroma. Enjoy the same coffee at home as you do in our restaurant, now in a package of 12 convenient single-serve cups!

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Corn Muffin Mix
MENU.DESCRIPTION: If you love the corn muffins at Cracker Barrel ® , just wait 'til you whip up a batch in your own kitchen. They're delicious for breakfast, lunch or dinner--whether plain or dressed up with creamy butter, tangy jam or sweet local honey.

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Mini Travel Checker Rug
MENU.DESCRIPTION: What a great way to have fun! Just roll up your checkers in this 12” square game rug and you’re ready to take your game almost anywhere!

MENU.NAME: Cracker Barrel Peg Game
MENU.DESCRIPTION: A great way to test your I.Q., this classic peg game has been with Cracker Barrel since the very beginning. Jump the pegs to remove as many as possible from the board.

MENU.NAME: Fried Apples
MENU.DESCRIPTION: These fried apples are the same Fried Apples as we serve in our restaurant and can be used as a breakfast or lunch side dish, or to make a delicious dessert recipe.

MENU.NAME: Hershey® Milk Chocolate Bar
MENU.DESCRIPTION: There’s happy, and then there’s HERSHEY’S Happy. Made with farm fresh milk, this HERSHEY’S Chocolate Bar makes life delicious. Unwrap a bar, break off a piece, savor and repeat.

MENU.NAME: Hershey® Milk Chocolate Bar with Almonds
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Chocolate lovers will seriously love this colossal candy bar, made with creamy HERSHEY'S Milk Chocolate and almonds. HERSHEY'S Giant Milk Chocolate with Almonds Bar is perfect as a present, especially when you’re the recipient!

MENU.NAME: MoonPie Double Decker, Chocolate, 2.75 oz, 12 Count Pack
MENU.DESCRIPTION: The Original Chocolate MoonPie is made with real sugar. This chocolate-flavored marshmallow pie sandwich will win over kids and adults alike. The mid-sized MoonPie comes packed in 12 individually wrapped MoonPies for your convenience.

MENU.NAME: Pecan Log - 7oz.
MENU.DESCRIPTION: An old-fashioned tradition. Our Pecan Logs are a handmade creation of rich nougat, dipped in creamy caramel, then hand-rolled in fresh chopped pecans. Great as a snack or slice a few to serve to guests.

MENU.NAME: Pure Natural Pancake Syrup
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Our Pure Natural Pancake Syrup is the same as served in our restaurant and is a great accompaniment to pancakes, french toast and more!

MENU.NAME: Sugar Free Syrup
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Looking for great taste with no sugar? Then try our Vermont Sugar Free Syrup produced by Maple Grove Farms. This maple-flavored syrup was developed for people with diabetes and for anyone seeking sugar free syrup without the guilt.

MENU.NAME: Weazel Ball
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Is it alive? The playful weazel chases and jumps the rolling motorball. The Weazel Ball ® is a fun surprise for all ages and is sure to bring hours of enjoyment. Requires 1 ?AA? battery, not included. Approximately 12? long. Ages 3 and up. Warning: Choking hazard - small parts. Not for children under 3 years.
